body:
Thank you very much, Mostapha! The addHBGlz component works fine now, but I got a new error message when connect the output zones with glazing to the window shade generator: **1. Solution exception: zone_A has been moved, scaled or rotated.**
**If you need to move or rotate a Honeybee object you should use Honeybee move, rotate or mirror components. You can find them under 12|WIP tab.** [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/1ry1JTt6rBIuTs4i6e9yoYfSrHrRuiojVtOx0gTdOdxJVCYVp1vQlbSAB8u14waoijb-DJAvDPWLcY9v5gjjpv8I3pv4qCYp/03.PNG)
